headline: Ed Ruscha Up and Went Home
abstract: The artist on the Oklahoma roots of his new show, that $52.5 million painting, and meeting Walt Disney.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — The artist Ed Ruscha has been based in Los Angeles since 1956, and has spent the better part of the last 60 years exploring that city’s iconography in a deadpan style that wavers between mundane and philosophical.
